item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

client.java:7444: not a statement
String text = command.substring(4);
^
client.java:7444: ‘;’ expected
String text = command.substring(4);
^
2 errors

item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

OK so i wanna make u need the shell to yell i made thi but it give errors.

if(playerHasItem(3345, 1)){ if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 8) String text = command.substring(4); yell(""+playerName+" yells: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } if(!playerHasItem(3345, 1)){ sM("You need a shell to yell!"); }
